column1: #lines starting with # should be ignored
#Column description
#name - name of the client e.g. Portugal
#nif - fiscal id number
#credit - value that indicates how many credit the client have in our system e.g. 10
#address_id - a reference that identify the address  e.g. 10
#e_mail - a reference that identify the e mail address e.g. espetaculo@rtp.pt
#credit_card_id - a reference that identify the credit card e.g. 1
#country - name of the country e.g. Portugal
#district - the district of the address e.g. Porto
#locality - the locality of the address  e.g. Gondomar
#zip_code - zip code related to this address e.g. 4000-222
#latitude - latitude related to this address e.g. -41
#longitude - longitude related to this address e.g. -8
#e-mail - the e mail address of the user e.g. user@superemail.org
#pass - the password e.g. querty
#number - the number of the credit card e.g. 4040404040101010
#cvv -  the cvv of the credit card
#validate - the validate of the credit card as date as YYYY-MM-DD e.g. 2021-01-26
name
Joao Melao
Fernando Mendes
Barack Obama
